originalText.text:
We are extraordinarily grateful to Little Daydreamers, Deborah, Patience, Mirna and all of the amazing staff for the wonderful work they've done with our son over the past year plus and we will miss them all immensely as he moves on to a 2s program (with a best bud he made at Little Daydreamers ðŸ˜Š).

With small class sizes and true 1:2 adult to child ratios, they are able to take such good care of every child and we are so grateful to them for helping our child become the sweet, funny, chatty, charming, outgoing, kind and thoughtful little toddler / little boy he is becoming. Their structure (meals, snacks, walks, naps, playtime), programs (art work, language, sign language, music, incoming specialty teachers) and superior level of care and concern are unmatched.

Our son has learned so much from Mirna, Yurkenia, Rebecca, Lily and the outside teachers that come in on a regular basis. He often surprises us with a song, sign or knowledge of a color or animal. ðŸ˜Š

We highly recommend Little Daydreamers to any parents. Your child will be safe, loved and will learn a great deal!

originalText.text: We love this daycare so much! Itâ€™s clear they adore the little ones and give them a lot of attention and love. Our little guy is very well adjusted and happy. Itâ€™s clean and bright, with a plethora of age appropriate toys for him to play with and explore. They also offer outings, music classes and arts and crafts. Communication and updates are also excellent . Definitely highly recommend, itâ€™s so good to know heâ€™s in the best hands and receiving the best care.

originalText.text:
We started with Little Daydreamers when our daughter was 12 weeks old, and we will be very sad to leave Mirna, Lilly, Rebecca, Deb and Patience when she transitions into a 3K program. Our experience has been overwhelmingly positive. The team has over a decade of experience and has consistently shown a nurturing and attentive approach towards our daughter. Their expertise is evident not only in their interactions but also in the educational activities they offer, for example teaching numbers, colors, and shapes often on a 1-on-1 basis. This personalized attention is made possible thanks to their high staff-to-child ratio.

The center's communication with us as parents is great. Real-time updates on our daughter's meals, naps, and diaper changes are provided through the Brightwheel app. Conveniently, the team provides home made meals and fresh fruit every day for children over one year old.

The children are taken outside every day when the weather permits. The facility itself is stimulating and welcoming, with recently refurbished play areas. Our daughter is presented with enriching activities like weekly music and sign language classes from external teachers and often surprises us with new signs that she has learned. Discovering these new skills and then searching for their meanings has become a delightful part of our routine. Watching the team engaging in regular reading and arts and crafts activities through the camera is a continual source of joy.

We've already recommended Little Daydreamers to other parents, a testament to the trust we have in their exceptional care.

originalText.text:
Iâ€™m writing a second review as my youngest child recently enrolled in their program.

When it was time to return to work I looked no place other than little daydreamers. Again, I am comforted knowing my child is in extremely competent, loving, nurturing hands. Mirna and her crew have cared for many babies and they know what they are doing!

originalText.text: I canâ€™t put into words how wonderful this daycare is and how Mirna and all the other teachers there have helped shape and develop my son emotionally and socially into a polite, thoughtful and thriving young gentleman. Itâ€™s wonderful how my son has learned sign language and Spanish while he was learning how to speak. He learned how to express himself physically and verbally and is so gentle to his friends that he had made there. They make homemade meals and snacks, there is a camera so you can look at your little one play, they go to the park everyday, and the app they use that you download alerts you to all the meals, diaper changes and nap; so you never have to worry about what your child is eating and what they are doing. The daycare is so clean and you can feel the love and attention that flows there everyday! If you want the best daycare that Inwood has to offer- look no further! My son is going into Pre-K very well prepared.
